item.title: zef[a]media UX Templates
item.description: zef[a]media's UX Template package contains sample paper prototypes/wireframes, personas, sitemaps, and user flow diagrams. Requires MS Visio, Word, and Excel. http://www.zefamedia.com/websites/free-ux-templates/

item.title: Textism Word HTML Cleaner
item.description: In my old days working on a corporate portal, I occasionally had to take someone's HTML, which was generated by Microsoft Word, and drop it into an entry on a CMS. But before I could just cut and paste, I had to run a series of regular expression replacements in vi or Allaire HomeSite to strip out any of the god awful HTML that Word generated. To pay homage to the past, fate recently dropped a Word HTML file in my lap.
